summary: Ernst & Young, or EY, is a big British company that offers professional services like accounting, consulting, and technology help. It's one of the top four biggest accounting firms worldwide. EY has lots of offices in many countries and employs hundreds of thousands of people. The company was created in 1989 when two accounting firms merged. In 2013, they changed their name to EY, which people had been calling them for a while. EY is known for being a great place to work but has also faced some criticism regarding its work culture and practices.
title: Ernst & Young
